phrases: What kind of lunch would you like?
Oh, do not worry, Miss Kobayashi.
I am even better than that.
Seems like we will have to settle this.
Do not underestimate the master of the house, Tohru!
Field Trip Lunch Competition Three Round Match!!
You guys even prepared this set?
You will each be making three dishes: a salad, a meat course, and a dessert.
Use all your skills and entertain me!
What is your character even supposed to be anymore?
Stay within budget as you make your decisions.
Be sure not to strain Miss Kobayashi's wallet.
They are both driven to win.
Contestant Kobayashi's appears to just be cherry tomatoes.
Mine's a seafood and paprika Caesar salad!
There is no comparing the two.
Yeah, there is no need to compare them.
The winner of the first round is Kobayashi.
How did my special salad lose to these cherry tomatoes?!
That is because you did not understand what a lunchbox is,
Bacon and eggs do not work?!
But bacon and eggs are delicious, right?
I often asked my parents to make them though...
Something in a cup, or a fruit, would work.
You are to bring one item that is not cooked.
This is unusual, is not it?
For you and Miss Kobayashi to fight.
I am happy to see Tohru like this.
What should I bring for the third dish?
But I am going to win!
This fight only happened because you have grown so close to each other.
Maybe I should call it pro-wrestling?
Every now and then is fine.
but she can be my friend, too.
Are you saying you and a dragon are equals, human?!
At least, Tohru and I both feel that way.
That is why we fought today.
I am not going to lose either.
Oh, I need to take off my shoes.
It is my first time seeing this.
Items from the other world are against the rules.
Even after everything, your food's still delicious, Tohru.
Who would have thought I would find you hiding out here...
Dragons disrupt the order of this world!
Hmph, I see you are as damn stiff, strict, and persistent as ever.
Lady Tohru and Lady Elma are on very bad terms.
Oh, did you learn that idiom at school?
They look like they are about to explode any second, but will things be okay?
but this time I will settle the score.
I cannot believe she can calmly let her stomach growl in this tense situation.
You have being very distracting, human!
That is quite the attitude from someone who just destroyed my home.
Please follow our laws before you try protecting order in this world.
Even Tohru would not do something like this.
Wait, why am I the one apologizing?!
Hey, she does not seem like a bad person, so why do not you get along?
Not all dragons are united in thought.
There is the harmony faction that values law and order,
the chaos faction that yearns for chaos and destruction,
and the spectating faction that does not work with either group or each other.
So Elma belongs to the harmony faction, and I am with the chaos faction,
So you are one of the villains.
I am a good dragon, on my best behavior in this world.
I am taking you home, Tohru!
By force, if I have to!
I will eliminate you from this world without a trace!
I have prepared another dimension, so we will do this there.
I am surprised to see the fiendish Tohru listening to a human.
I simply respected order like she said.
Now, now, time to fix what she destroyed.
By the way, where did you send her?
The field Kanna and I played in before.
I cannot believe you sent me to another continent!
I am happy as long as I can quietly be a maid in this world.
You are planning to take over this world, are not you?!
Have not you eaten anything since yesterday?
I-I am not from this world, so I cannot interfere...
Oh, something like this should be all right.
W-Well, I will kindly take you up on the offer to help restore my strength.
It is melting in my mouth!
If you leave, I will give you all of these.
I will be working with you starting today.
It is a pleasure to meet you.
I could ask you the same, human.
So this is just a coincidence?
I am investigating the cultural standards to see if beings from
the other world really can integrate here.
She did say you were with the harmony faction.
But hey, can you do this job?
You cannot use magic, you know.
There is no way I cannot do human labor.
I cannot understand any of it.
What is everyone doing with them?
Human, you do some pretty difficult work.
But I have memorized romanized character input or whatever, too,
so I will not stay behind anymore!
Now then, when will I earn my pay for today's work?
Oh, uh, a month from now.
We total out at the end of the month, and today's the first.
What do I do for rent and food?
Well, if you commute from the other world...
Oh, could it be that you cannot go back?
I do not possess enough power to open the gate between worlds.
She came through the gate Tohru opened.
I thought your power was equal to Tohru's?
Well, I am sure you have got a lot on your plate, but hang in there.
If you are going to be working with me, I will have you learn a lot more.
Those are hot, so be careful.
I guess I should keep quiet about meeting Elma today.
There is a strange smell on you.
Are you secretly cheating on me?!
You have picked up another weird phrase.
You have learned a lot about PC operation, huh, Elma?
I will prove myself useful at this job.
Well, you have still got a ways to go.
Let us have some sweet chestnuts on the way home!
It is been a while since my last day off.
I want to take it easy today.
I will clean everything so you can enjoy your day off in a clean room, Miss Kobayashi!
I am grateful for that, but...
When I get serious, I can make a room spotless of all dust!
It is brand new, as if Shiva passed through!
A space for relaxation does not need any of that!
Please enjoy sleeping to your heart's content in this spacious room!
be it a full course meal or an imperial feast!
Oh, shall I slaughter a cow?
Let me have a light breakfast.
You want me to satisfy your lust, not just your appetite?!
You are spinning your wheels though.
It is like you have reverted to how you were when you first came to me.
You are always helping me out.
So I brought something to thank you.
Today I am taking you ba
Even so, I am holding back and putting up with it a lot.
wanting lots and lots of praise.
Wanting you to pet my head a bit.
I am not used to being wanted.
That is never happened to me before.
I do not have a clue what to do about it.
Often I think human relationships are just confusing.
Sometimes I even put distance between myself and others.
I have had friends, but never close friends.
I cannot make it any clearer than this.
Take the hint, take the hint.
I will make you a protective charm, too.
You will gain the protection of evil gods!
For now, please put down the cream bread you are holding.
